data.title: Discover music on NTS
data.meta_description:
Jean-Louis Murat has been played on NTS shows including The Do!! You!!! Breakfast Show w/ Charlie Bones, with Les Rouges Souliers first played on 22 February 2019.

Jean-Louis Murat (born January 28th 1952 in La Bourboule, France  – died 25 May 2023), is a well-known singer, composer, lyricist and guitarist who has also done some acting (in Jacques Doillon's 1990 film La Vengeance d’une Femme). Murat is a cultivator of a specific style, a certain musical aesthetic. Haunting and often sensual moods characterize his music.
data.text:
Jean-Louis Murat has been played on NTS shows including The Do!! You!!! Breakfast Show w/ Charlie Bones, with Les Rouges Souliers first played on 22 February 2019.

Jean-Louis Murat (born January 28th 1952 in La Bourboule, France – died 25 May 2023), is a well-known singer, composer, lyricist and guitarist who has also done some acting (in Jacques Doillon's 1990 film La Vengeance d’une Femme). Murat is a cultivator of a specific style, a certain musical aesthetic. Haunting and often sensual moods characterize his music.
